text: Marcelo Guadalupe Alatorre Maldonado (born 18 January 1985 in Guadalajara, Jalisco, México) is a Mexican footballer, who plays as defender. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Jalisco Category:Sportspeople from Guadalajara, Jalisco Category:Association football defenders Category:Mexican footballers Category:Tecos F.C. footballers Category:Leones Negros UdeG footballers Category:Club Universidad Nacional footballers Category:C.D. title: Marcelo Alatorre
